subject: Soccer
African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast, Algeria and Nigeria, three of the heavyweights who are preparing for the World Cup in South Africa, perhaps lacked the motivation to win the first time out in the African Cup of Nations.
snippet: Ivory Coast, Algeria and Nigeria, three of the heavyweights who are preparing for the World Cup in South Africa, perhaps lacked the motivation to win the first time out in the African Cup of Nations.
